If you could make the choice between two leaders who would you choose?

Leader #1 is telling you there is a deadly disease and you can not have a normal life anymore.This will be forever because of yearly mutations and vaccinates can not be adapted this fast.

Leader #2 is telling you that leader #1 is just lying. Leader #2 tells you that you should know that there are no more people dying than the last years. Yes it might be a little bit more than usual than normal, but this is just a small statistical abnormality . He tells you that he might be wrong and that maybe 10% of the population could die. But then he tells you that despite of all this you can have a normal life with no masks or social distancing or restrictions on large public gatherings. Yeah some people will die, but you (if you survive) will have a normal life.He tells you that he will use more money to build hospitals and pay better wages for healthcare workers, to encourage more people to choose these kind of jobs. He tells you that this might come to late, but he will try it anyway.

Who would you choose and why? Additional: This decision can not be reversed it will determine the rest of your life?
So choose wisely.
